explanation:
Signin can fail for multiple different reasons, mainly user does not exists, is not activated or
          password is invalid.

parameters.name: grant_type
parameters.description: OAuth Grant type to use, always `password`

response_fields.name: error
response_fields.description:
Error code that describes actual error why sign in and token generation has failed.
        <dl>
        <dt>pending_validation</dt><dd>User exists but has not been validated his/hers email address yet.</dd>
        <dt>no_user</dt><dd>User with given email address cannot be found in the system.</dd>
        </dl>

response_headers.WWW-Authenticate: Bearer realm="Doorkeeper", error="invalid_grant", error_description="The provided authorization grant is invalid, expired, revoked, does not match the redirection URI used in the authorization request, or was issued to another client."
